00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 namespace lsf {
00010 namespace basic {
00011 
00012 template <typename ObjectType>
00013 class Singleton {
00014 public:
00015     static ObjectType* Instance() { return &Reference(); }
00016 
00017     static ObjectType& Reference() {
00018         static ObjectType _Instance;
00019         return _Instance;
00020     }
00021 
00022 protected:
00023     Singleton() {}                            // construtor is hidden
00024     Singleton(Singleton const& );             // copy constructor is hidden
00025     Singleton &operator=(Singleton const& );  // copy assignment is hidden
00026 };
00027 
00028 }  // end of namespace basic
00029 }  // end of namespace lsf
00030
